resources.string: if you have any exception in bigbang，you can switch mode "Monitoring the text "to see the effect。
Please try to long press above words
Open the BigBang can experience translation function
Sorting mode \n by dragging the change the arrangement of words \n word choice mode click again
After you select the text,you can click on the button above the text to experience
Share \n will choose words share to other apps

\t\t\tIf this product have some use abnormalities, including monitor does not work, or program is often-cleaned, please ensure that you have to add this product to a list of phone housekeeping clean white-lists, and allows it starts\n\t\t\tSince this product is made by some technical means to obtain you click or copy the words, and some of the application is not fully in conformity with the standards, so I can\'t get right to the text, switch monitoring text could only a partial solution。\n\t\t\tIf you find any problems, please use feedback function to contact us, we will solve your problem as soon as possible！
BigBang 是您的快捷助手，您只需在设置中开启BigBang的辅助功能，便可以在任意app中对文字进行进行编辑，包括分词，翻译，复制以及动态调整，希望您能在日常生活中获得便利
Select the image from the gallery for Ocr
Copy mode \n will choose words are copied to the clipboard
Word choice mode \ n by sliding and click to select words
A touch namely, convenient for your life！
I\'m sorry,but did not get to the text
Lack of running the required permissions \n please click on the "Settings" - "authority" - open access \n then click the back button to return to this page。
The following Settings entrance to improve viability of the program, but not phone housekeeping clean white-lists, may not be able to thoroughly solve the problem！
Search mode\n words selected will be searched by default browser

Switch on the top right corner, in the pop-up dialog box click 'confirm'.

Can be open in WeChat, various applications such as QQ chat page click or long press text chat bubble, then open the BigBang page。

This function does not need to root your phone you just open the service, pop-up prompts you to authorize, click on the confirmation。
Monitoring click/long-click open auxiliary functions as required，Please open in the set！
Please give application necessary permissions to let it works properly。
